name: Tap To Merge
description:
GAME PLAY: The rule of this game is very simple. You have to Tap and Merge the adjacent tiles with same number and color, and they will pop up. Tap again, they will sum in the position you tap. Try to get 10, or even higher!

Feature

Easy to play (like classical line game) but very difficult to become master
Easy to become addicting game player
Social network sharing and challenge friends
Modern graphic make users feel impressive and comfortable
Submit and save high score
